item.title: Communications Systems (VHF) VHF Comm – Frequency Indication

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided one left transmitter/receiver and one other VHF transmitter/receiver is operative.

note.para: Log frequency assignments. Use operating control head only.

placard.para: Placard affected Comm Control Panel "FREQUENCY INDICATION INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
